website_summaries.verdict: This ultra lightweight and high-powered laptop is a workhorse for everyday use.
pros: Super lightweight and easy to carry
15-inch UHD display, 10th-gen Intel i7 processor, 8 GB memory, 128 GB SSD storage, Bluetooth enabled, Comes with Windows 10
cons: The underwhelming battery life is frustrating
Despite the sleek design, the plastic components are flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Just received computer today and was very happy to get it up and running. I will be returning it. The display is garbage and that is my own fault for not noticing the pixels when it was ordered, but it still should not be a complete washed out looking. Cheaply made. Keyboard feels like cheap plastic, it IS plastic. The only good thing I will say is that it does seem fairly quick, though no quicker than my old laptop which I am on right now. Fan is always running and noisy. I don't understand how it got any good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: edward w haedike jr

customer_reviews.title: Great small business
customer_reviews.text: Product was everything I expected. The laptop was upgraded as stated and came with detailed instructions for how to verify the upgrades.
customer_reviews.author: MD1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop exceeded all expectations. I've use laptops with previous versions of the Intel core i5 chipset but this one blows them all away. I was expecting an improvement in performance from this 10th gen machine but it was more than I had hoped. It's a fast, snappy and responsive machine, especially for the price point. The touchscreen is responsive and works as expected. The display is vibrant, nice color and resolution. It's even an attractive little machine. If you're looking for something to meet your computing needs but don't want to break the bank, look no further and just buy it. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie C.

customer_reviews.title: Slow AF
customer_reviews.text: Wery slow!!!!it takes him almost three minutes to start!ad then even to load 'this computer' i have to wait!!!and this is 10th gen i5????my 10 years hp g 64 was so much better!!!dont wayste your money on this!!!very glitcy and dissapointing too bad mr seller!i vant to return it NOW!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this laptop would meet my expectations. I researched it for 2 weeks comparing it to other options. Each time I’d try to find a reason not to buy it since the price was so much less than others with comparable specs. Well finally went for it. Boy did it exceed expectations. It is blazing fast, extremely light and well crafted. Now if you’re looking for a backlit keyboard and an alloy case(it’s plastic) don’t get it. So if you are rough on your laptop, it might not be for you. But if you want performance and elegant design, this is definitely the best bang for the buck I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Hendo

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS LAPTOP!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend that you look for a different laptop strongly enough. After a month of use, I have had nothing but problems. Main issues: - It runs incredibly slow. - Fan is loud and hot and almost always on. - Battery life is HORRIBLE. Drains in less than an hour on battery saver. Other issues: - I've had problems connecting to wifi. - USB slots are incredibly difficult to connect to. I feel absolutely ripped off by this laptop. The 20% restocking fee they charge for a return is also ridiculous. I feel like I wasted my money. Follow my advice. Don't waste yours.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good laptop for price. 15 second start up from power off. Fast program processing. All in all. Worth the value. Would have liked to seen the ability to upgrade the ssd hd to a 1 TB ssd hd for an upgrade fee.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: I can not even get it to open
customer_reviews.text: it let me partially set up, and then would not do anything. Now it takes 15 minutes to even get a screen to show, and will not open Windows at all! do not waste your money. I am sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Willowkara

customer_reviews.title: A very nice laptop that was easy to setup for my wife.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife for Christmas. The setup went without a hitch and the 500 Gbyte SSD made boot up very fast. I was pleased that there was not a lot of extra software that needed to be removed. The touch screen worked fine and was clear and colorful.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. McHenry

customer_reviews.title: WIFI fail
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Super fast start up. Touchscreen perfect and clear. B U T No wifi. As in, it won't connect to my home's wifi for more than a minute, at best. And even when it does connect, it says there is no signal. Did all the troubleshooting. No luck. My husband is a web developer and again, no luck. I can even download WORD so I can get some work done until this is sorted because that requires internet access. What's the point of a laptop that's great in every way that you can't use?
customer_reviews.author: Epow

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Had it 45 days, fan was always very loud then died and gave fault code on startup. Tried updating bios but no help. Amazon seller wasn't much help so had to send it back to HP. HP said the problem was "deeper" than the fan and couldn't be repaired, said the problem could be that the laptop was sitting in the seller warehouse too long. HP replaced with a refurbished vendor return model. So far so good but it's been a hassle. At least HP covered all repair costs and shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FEATURES, POWERFUL, ULTRA LIGHTWEIGHT LAPTOP!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good laptop for the $500 or so I spent -- NO complaints! However, the keyboard is a bit iffy.. sometimes things occur that i did not do myself. The quality of the laptop itself feels cheap - (but I've been using a MacBook Pro for 5 years now) I guess i'm a bit spoiled.. Overall, it is feature rich, and very powerful! It does what I need it to do, which is for Data Analysis primarily. Finally, it weighs hardly nothing!! I'd consider it to be feather light almost. As far as speed and power goes - It BLOWS my old MacBook Pro out of the water!! Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth B. Grey

customer_reviews.title: Great speed, great value!
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best laptop I've ever owned and so happy with the value of this computer. With 16GB of memory, i5 processor and a 512GB SSD, it's incredibly fast to boot up, even from a full shut down. Battery life is very good, although it seems to diminish a bit even if shut down (not just on Sleep). There is really no bloatware or ads to speak of and the operating system and file setup is very clean. Absolute favorite and I would buy again in a heartbeat -- all for about $500.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyK

customer_reviews.title: Best Laptop I've Had.  Love it!  Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best laptop that I've ever owned. Very fast, lightweight and yet it's plenty sturdy. Solid buttons on the keyboard and the touch pad has the perfect sensitivity. Love the speed of the solid state drive and it's quiet too. Doesn't come with a bunch of annoying junk software installed. The 16GB of RAM is Awesome! Battery life is very good. I could not be happier with this product.
customer_reviews.author: loosenup

customer_reviews.title: A great laptop so far
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for 3 weeks now and it has performed great so far. Setup was a breeze and only lasted for a few minutes. It comes with a 30 day subscription to McAfee but I chose to install my own antivirus software. Installing software is fast. From opening the box I was ready to have my daughter use the laptop for a school project in an hour and the slowest part of the whole thing is my internet speed but the laptop does its best to make up for the slow service. There's 1 negative and its really not a big deal and that's the fan on the video card is always going except when it's in sleep mode.
customer_reviews.author: John Retire

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this Laptop to others
customer_reviews.text: Product came through as advertised, good value for the $$$. Just beginning to use so we’ll see how it performs over the long haul, but don’t see any issues to date. I also liked that I did not have to disable Windows10 S Mode prior to installing 3rd party programs, I.e; Google Chrome and a security suite, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop but disapointed with clock speed
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice laptop especially if your using it for general day to day stuff. One thing that did bother me is that it said in the description that the ghz would get up to 3.6, but mine wouldn't go over 1.19ghz. I found a way to dedicate more processors that helped a little but it rarely can get over 1.90ghz. But over all its a good laptop.
customer_reviews.author: marlee s.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an older Toshiba with this HP. This baby is fast. I read a lot of reviews about this product before buying. One person said it was slow, another said the WiFi was junk. I had no problem with laptop. It is very fast, the screen is fantastic. The overall ease of Windows 10 is great. I am not a big fan of touchscreens, so don't use it much. Another complaint in the reviews was the touch pad being sensitive. I will agree it is very sensitive, but with practice it is becoming easier to use. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BH1970

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop for under 500!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this laptop for about 2 weeks and OMG I love it! Fast, lightweight and everything I was looking for! I have to admit, that I am not a touchscreen-user though. I use mouse and keypad 100% of the time. Just finished installing Office (2016) and everything runs super fast! I checked all the specs and it has all that was advertised! So far very pleased and therefore 5 stars! IF there is one downside to be mentioned it is the keyboard. It feels a little bit cheap, but that might just be my personal feeling - only time will tell :-)
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Schnettler

customer_reviews.title: This is not a quad core and only 1ghz processor slow as mud
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying a good pc this is a single core 1ghz slow piece of crap I checked the system and it does not say quad or 4 core anywhere. I have a 12 year old laptop that is much faster then this one. Watch what you buy and read all the fine print very disappointed in this product I have I can return it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid laptop
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this HP laptop for almost four months (my first laptop) and no problems at all. It does boot up very fast, it is quiet, and responsive to all of my basic needs. Set up was very easy. The battery life is the only downfall, but since this is my first laptop I'm not familiar with how long a battery should run before needing a charge. I get about 3 hours before I need to plug it in. Other than that, this is a great laptop (so far).
customer_reviews.author: fuzzy_slippers

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Support
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the support I received on this laptop. There was very little paperwork. It said it came with 90 day phone support but listed no number. I tried using the HP virtual assistant and that was no help. I tried setting up my Spectrum email. I called Spectrum and all my settings were correct. They were able to give me a number for HP and again I was suppose to use the HP virtual assistant. The whole thing was very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Janna C.

customer_reviews.title: McAfee nightmare
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this is a good laptop but I am ready to send it back. It was working fine at first, but then the ‘free’ McAfee program took over. I use Norton and installed my existing Norton license. Now I can’t get anything to work, Norton is trying to uninstall McAfee for me but it is hung; in the meantime I keep getting repeated pop ups from McAfee. It is slowing the whole system down and I am beyond fed up with it. McAfee is junk which is why they give it away for free, worse than a virus because it is holding my computer hostage! 😡
customer_reviews.author: mcclain7490

customer_reviews.title: My first laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Although I have yet to utilize all the bells and whistles, this lap top does have amazing resolution on its screen, the sound is fantastic as well. Love it so far. Made easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Munro

customer_reviews.title: Great for personal use.  Super fast startup!
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked at how fast this laptop starts up and shuts down! Under 10 seconds for each! I'm not a fan of touch screens so probably won't use it. I work with HUGE spreadsheets and this laptop works well with the 16gb of ram. The cooling fan is pretty loud but it doesn't bother me. I'm happy with my purchase and would recommend this laptop for personal use. I don't think it is rugged enough for business use where you are moving it alot. I don't think the exterior would hold up to much abuse.
customer_reviews.author: BC Buff

customer_reviews.title: Major WiFi Issue - Returned
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast and easy. Product was as expected, except the WiFi was non-functional. Someone else wrote a similar review. With all the positive reviews I chose to ignore that concern, but they were right. I was on the phone with support from HP for nearly 2 hours and at the end they recommended returning it. This laptop would have likely been perfect, if the WiFi worked.
customer_reviews.author: CarGuy76

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one because my wife had to work from home. The system she had to sign into remotely needed a laptop better than the one she had. The HP we bought cam with 10th gen i5, quadcore, and 16 Ram and fit the bill perfectly, Hard to beat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas O.

customer_reviews.title: Immediate Return
customer_reviews.text: The computer ran slow right out of the box. The speakers would have a static noise every so often while watching media. I did not use it long enough to test much of anything else. The computer would struggle operating or opening more than one program at a time. It is worth it to just upgrade further and pay the difference. I will say the battery life is pretty solid. If you are looking to just complete basic microsoft office jobs, this may work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Fizhy

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work out of the box
customer_reviews.text: As soon as we turned it on, the screen went green/black and we kept getting the error Automatic Repair message of some kind. We tried everything we read....reboot etc. Nothing worked. We are returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeep Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great awesome buuutt needs attention.
customer_reviews.text: Great Laptop its my first day, It came in early. Update** Well everything was fine until I really started using it, and it keeps on crashing down with this blue screen and just shuts down in the middle of whatever youre doing. If am in a conference call ill shut the hell down it doesn't care. If am singing up for something and creating accounts it just suddenly appears this blue screen and shuts the hell down. Well well. Oh and besides it keeps on saying that my windows isn't original. So what the heck ? Besides all of that mean while it works. I just use it for emails conferences and thats about it.
customer_reviews.author: Ly

customer_reviews.title: Not HD - falsely advertised. Returned the day after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Not an HD laptop. False advertising and you will notice right away. It is touchscreen, but definitely not HD. Made the return the next day after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Fan is WAY too loud
customer_reviews.text: I usually purchase HP laptops. Although this one is fast, the fan is extremely loud and will start up even when there are no major programs running. Even if the motherboard is cool. My previous HP is from 2015 and there are never fan noises I have to deal with. This one is loud enough to make me regret ever purchasing this computer. Be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Extremely loud
customer_reviews.text: The fan is extremely loud, louder than my old laptop that this is supposed to be replacing. It is always constantly going, as well. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N

customer_reviews.title: Good computer.
customer_reviews.text: The laptop was easy to set up and works fine. I have not done a lot with it yet. I did connect a second monitor with HDMI. It's a full HD display and the color is much warmer and more realistic than the screen on the laptop. I see that the laptop does not have HDR. The resolution seems fine but the color is somewhat drab. I tried but could not find a way to adjust the color settings on the laptop. If anyone has suggestions for that please pass them along. Other than that I'm happy with the computer and it seems a very good deal at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Not a US brand HP but it’s good
customer_reviews.text: It may not be a US brand HP but the specs for a similar one is better, so far so good. Fast start up no issues connecting to anything, fast downloading and processing for new apps and products
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Recommend, few negatives
customer_reviews.text: My main complaint is there’s an ear piercing squeak that comes from the backspace button. Obviously this is a commonly used button and is very annoying. Also, there’s a scratch/indent above the mousepad. Super disappointing. Other than that, the battery life is decent, could be better - could be worse. Love the touchscreen (a big reason I purchased this one). Love the look and style. I feel it is slightly overpriced, but maybe that’s just my own opinion. Overall, I would recommend this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Scott

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: This is very slow and not very responsive. The battery life well let's just say if I plan on using it for more than a couple hours I have to plug it in. Not very happy with this laptop at all
customer_reviews.author: melissa warner

customer_reviews.title: when does the warranty clock start?
customer_reviews.text: Got my "new" pc delivered two days ago - took it to the person who was transferring my data and setting me up - got a call "there's a problem" - the 1 year warranty started in Sept 2019 - I have 24 days left. Really! Either Amazon or the third party seller needs to figure something better out - I have returned this pc and bought from someone other than Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: L Hydrick

customer_reviews.title: This Computer is a total scam
customer_reviews.text: No one should buy from this seller. PC battery drains within 5 hours after it is fully charged. Using to watch a movie or play music, it drains in 1 and half hours. Bluetooth does not work. Keyboard has no keypad lights. Camera has poor resolution. And this cost $800 plus. I have never regretted like this ever. I tried to replace or return, and only God knows where they are now. Still working on returning it though. If you don't want to be in my position, don't try you hard earned money on this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin N Nsoh

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great lap top and it does what I need at such a great price. But unfortunately the battery is worthless. I’ll leave it on a full charge before bed and wake up to a dead battery after not even owning it 3 months. Being stuck staying by an outlet kind of defeats the purpose of a lap top.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Little

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre low res display hampers an otherwise good laptop.
customer_reviews.text: 16gb, 512gb SSD, 10 generation Intel i5. Solid aluminum like plastic build. Good speakers. Decent keyboard. Fair battery life. At $525 it was an excellent value, despite having a lackluster low res screen with a narrow viewing angle and a proprietary charging port.
customer_reviews.author: Earl J. Depass

customer_reviews.title: Good Laptop
customer_reviews.text: The screen is big. It's lightweight and very easy to set up. I just wish the screen resolution was higher in pixels. Pictures are not hd.
customer_reviews.author: Anastatia Theriot

customer_reviews.text: BEST BUDGET LAPTOP EVER!!!!!! Have had this laptop since february and BRO this thang is a beauty and a beast! the only downfall is running high processing software without a charger in sight. after about an hour and a half, which is really not that long, the battery needs to be recharged.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great Computer
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. I am surprised by any negative reviews. One review said it was noisy, that is silly. It is very fast. It boots up within seconds of hitting the power button. Many options and access much more than my older HP had. I am very pleased. Arrived very quick from this seller. Very important to research the seller. I am very happy with this product. I was a Windows 7 hold out but glad I made the upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very responsive.
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. It boots in seconds, the touch screen works well and looks good plus the computer does not lag at all. The only issue I have with this laptop is the ssd size (512 GIGS). 1 or 2 t's would have been better but M.2 NVME drives can get pricey at those lvls so I would get a second hdd or sdd for added storage. Other then this I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Branch

customer_reviews.title: Webcam doesn't work, overheats, short battery life, and NOT NEW
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed by this laptop. I purchased it specifically for my online master's class. I found out the webcam only very sporadically works during an important zoom presentation for class. The battery also doesn't last very long at all and the laptop constantly overheats, causing the insanely loud fan to come on constantly. It's fast and the touch screen is cool, but these other problems make it not worth it. When I tried to contact HP support to resolve my webcam issue, I was told that the one year manufacturer's warranty this product was supposed to come with will be up in three months. In other words: this laptop is not new as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Judd

customer_reviews.title: Warranty half way through. Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy computers on Amazon!! EVERY computer have a tried to buy has a compromised warranty. Buyer beware!!!! Bought this laptop April 2020; warranty expires in October!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Bach

customer_reviews.title: Fast Computer
customer_reviews.text: This computer works just like described. The computers both work very well & with a 10th generation i5 processor and a SSD the computer moves right along when it is asked to do something. Excellent price to value.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Bytes

customer_reviews.title: Use as a desktop
customer_reviews.text: Once you start moving the laptop it starts giving the issue. 8 time out of 10 time if I pick up the laptop to move to other place then it crashes and it gives zombi sound. also, it's Touchpad/Mousepad location is also not correct it takes time to adjust. Other then this this laptop is ok no issue. Sep Update: One of worst laptop I have ever used. It crashes 15-20 times a day. you never know when it will crash. sometimes just by going to amazon.com it crashes. I think 1 star rating is proper. I would suggest ignore buying this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: lilshopper

customer_reviews.title: Very portable and light laptop
customer_reviews.text: This os a good little laptop 15 inch screen very gaste for working anywhere I was very amaze with the size and lightness it is a feather to carry on For casual work and we at to go is the best
customer_reviews.author: DARKKON

customer_reviews.title: For the price paid, quality is good, processor is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Got this computer in 1st week of March 2020, its a good laptop for the price paid, absolutely value for money. The processor is fast as advertised and for my work. Handles multiple 4 excel sheets with 5k plus rows from cloud servers while still running browser without hanging. The numeric keypad and screen size is big enough for finance/statistic related work and anyone who doesn't want to stress their eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Aruna

customer_reviews.title: Very Slow Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: .It is extremely slow when transferring files or anytime you click on anything like it has to think about it \ update; I have managed to improve the speed considerably by removing the HP garbage and the "free offers" like macfee - junk
customer_reviews.author: OldLobo

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was perfect
customer_reviews.text: Screen goes black for no reason and fan is loud and it doesn’t wanna work if it’s not plugged in other than that I absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: Michele Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: The laptop Couldn’t operate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop and ship to family member in China. Then we realized that the laptop can not operate. This wasted a lot time. This is very horrible
customer_reviews.author: Yingying Mei

customer_reviews.title: SLOW VREY SLOW
customer_reviews.text: Using this computer felt like i am sitting behind a 20 year old computer. My God was it slow...... i went on sketchup.com and a pop-up message told me that this website will slow your computer down... horrible computer, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Gevorg Nazaryan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hubby to use at our remote cabin during hunting trip. Since we only have solar out there this worked great. Great picture, awesome antena. We recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MomDash

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item "new", the box came "sealed" and when I opened it I found a deep scratch near the finger pad.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this for very long, but I really like it so far. It's quick to boot up, it can handle the load of being my main work computer and a light gaming computer (minecraft). It can sometimes get a little out of breath but it comes back pretty quickly. A good laptop for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Easnadh

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but a few misses.
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit slower than I expected. Picture is pretty good. Very light. They missed out by not lighting the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is everything I needed. I bought an older one I7 from Best buy only because was an I7. I was all excited when I got it but the screen had a defect: a blue line. Went to a BB store and tried to exchange but no success. Asked for refund and bought this one from HP. The touch screen is awesome. The machine is fast. Light weight and it is perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: This HP laptop is a dream . If you want a computer that has the steam to do just about anything, at a very primo price this is it. The only thing it doesnt have is the back lit key pad and internal dvd. But you can get an external dvd. And a book light. This computer rocks . IM SOOOOO HAPPY !
customer_reviews.author: karen hartig

customer_reviews.title: Fast start up
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. Starts up super fast. Everything about this laptop is great. I bought it for work and it does everything I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry S

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. She loves it! Battery lasts 3 times longer than her old laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Paul M

customer_reviews.title: Runs Well With Ubuntu 19.10
customer_reviews.text: I ditched Windows 10 on this machine and installed Ubuntu 19.10 instead. It runs like a champ. Fast and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: SunCoastKid

customer_reviews.title: Laptop Exceeds Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I had my old laptop for 9+ years but never realized how slow it had gotten until I got this new one. It is extremely fast booting up and loading files and web pages. I was a little hesitant buying it because a couple of reviews complained about the wifi turning off for no reason. I have had no such problem. I won't travel with it often but it is very light so should not present any problem when I do take it with me. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: NJ/FLguy

customer_reviews.title: Was Dead in only 3 month's of use.
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked Compaq (now HP). How ever this one stopped working only after a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Volleycycleman

customer_reviews.title: Battery goes down fast
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been disappointed in the battery, with a couple hours of typical typing and email, by the end of the day the battery has to be charged. This is NOT using it for watching movies or all day use.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia M

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.....
customer_reviews.text: This laptop gets the job done, but it's loud and the battery is subpar. Maybe a bit overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this laptop. I've had it for a few months, working from home, shopping from home, zoom meetings all with no problems. I do wish it came with the Microsoft Office but most laptops don't these days.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this laptop for several months now and haven’t had a single problem. It’s slim, lightweight and fast. The battery life is probably around 4 hours. Some people Complained about the fan. It does turn on occasionally but has never been excessively loud or problematic in any way. Very good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Faye Stauber

customer_reviews.title: Performs
customer_reviews.text: It's great. I love it, when it gets hot though its loud hahaha but other than that its good. Lets see in 4 month of view
customer_reviews.author: Eric Luis V.

customer_reviews.title: I liked this pc good enough to buy a 2nd one for my husband
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I do not like about this laptop is the two USB ports are so close to each other that some USB wires cannot plug in side by side.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma 1206

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting better resolution
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is for my kid to start the online school during covid. I was expecting a little better resolution but the equipment works fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Rivera Bran

customer_reviews.title: If you need a touch screen computer this is good.
customer_reviews.text: Not a hp fan . But so far. This laptop has been good for my Expectations. This machine works well and the sata drive works great as well.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: small and light
customer_reviews.text: bought the laptop for personal use. Very fast start up. 10th gen. Screen is not all that great for movie but work is suitable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tom3169

customer_reviews.title: Nice so far...
customer_reviews.text: Just received it this week, have used it twice. So far I like it but a little to early to really write anything detailed about it. Got to navigate around windows 10, had 7.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Thacker

customer_reviews.title: Great for School
customer_reviews.text: My high school student was in need of a new laptop and this was perfect! He loves the touch screen and big screen. I love it because it is easier for me to operate then a Mac. Great cost and shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jill L.

customer_reviews.title: Six months and going strong
customer_reviews.text: Battery life when using this for school and life gets me through the entire day. Unless I'm editing a video or some other resource hog computer work.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny Vasbinder

customer_reviews.title: Might just be the BEST computer I've bought!
customer_reviews.text: Got this on short notice after my old Dell's hard drive died suddenly. The battery life is LONG when unplugged, and it's fast both in general and when booting. The hard drive space is a tad small for my liking, but I bought an external 1TB drive to deal with that.
customer_reviews.author: Jennett

customer_reviews.title: fast and responsive. Good value for cost!
customer_reviews.text: good quality laptop. Did not come pre loaded with alot of garbage. Bought it for my grandparents. They love it!
customer_reviews.author: The_Kerchners

customer_reviews.title: Amazing computer
customer_reviews.text: This computer is amazing I love it does exactly what I need it to and fast with no problems at all I game on it and stream movies all the time with no lag completely recommend for and all around computer that can get the job done
customer_reviews.author: ReedFurtado

customer_reviews.title: Very fast!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome laptop! LOVE the touchscreen. The computer is super fast and perfect for what we use it for! Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa68

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal
customer_reviews.text: Very fast, very nice looking laptop. I have been very satisfied with this computer and it was a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Buehler

customer_reviews.title: Good computer for the money
customer_reviews.text: My expectations were met. I use the computer for email, social media and personal business. Fast startup, good response time and clear graphics. Overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Getting things done fast!
customer_reviews.text: I love the speed of this laptop. It also has an amazing picture capacity. Easy to use (I seem to be somewhat technically challenged). It is very sensitive to touch, with not always pleasing results.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Ernst

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed. This was the easiest PC to set up I have ever had. It is lightening fast and easily beats my other laptop (HP with Intel i7-5500U and 16 GB Ram). So far so great!
customer_reviews.author: JinTennessee

customer_reviews.title: Out of warranty-old computer
customer_reviews.text: The computer won't turn on. Something is wrong and I called HP support for service and they told me the warranty expired 14 days ago! I've only owned the computer for a little over a month. The seller is selling older machines that are out of warranty! Beware
customer_reviews.author: Lyndi Mallory

customer_reviews.title: I Liked It
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this machine. For the price, it is an amazing deal from a good seller. I, unfortunately, needed to return it for a model with a Thunderbolt, which sadly I had to give up the touch screen. Entirely possible I might buy a couple of these in the future, especially if this seller is still carrying them.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: The fan is a little loud but it's a great computer. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Zalewski

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Connected to a 27 inch monitor, with external keyboard and mouse. Works Awesome!. Been using it this way for past 3-4 months. No issues Instantly connects to add's ons. no noise while do office work keeping the laptop monitor closed far better than keeping a desktop PC on Thanks
customer_reviews.author: ANISH K.

customer_reviews.title: I just freaking love it!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg this is ridiculously AWESOME!!! So much functionality to it and it looks brand new!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steph7

customer_reviews.title: Bad Network Card!
customer_reviews.text: Network card was bad right out of the box. Other then that, the computer itself was fine. Apparently, HP likes to use RealTek network cards even though they’re known to be faulty.
customer_reviews.author: sarah bell

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great home computer that didn't break the bank. Lightweight and I love the touch screen. It was suggested by 3 IT friends.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Very fast for a laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Used as back up for main desktop computer, also from HP!
customer_reviews.author: Elpidio A. Dosado

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Impressive laptop. Everything works great right now. Battery life not bad but wished it was longer.
customer_reviews.author: Papa B

customer_reviews.title: So far, so great!
customer_reviews.text: It's faster than I could have ever imagined. Great storage capacity. Very responsive, yet not overly sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent performance
customer_reviews.text: Product was a gift, but I'm being told my daughter is very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Waddington

customer_reviews.title: The computer is nice but the screen is a let down.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to watch a movie on it because the viewing angle is not good at all
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Speed is great.
customer_reviews.text: This laptop was a present for my wife's retirement so I wanted something she could use for a long time. I searched for over a month for the best features for the best price and I am completely satisfied with our purchase. I am most impressed with how fast it boots up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Light, Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Use this laptop for business. SSD makes startup and operations fast, touchscreen works great and it is light. Great for carrying around with me as I work everyday.
customer_reviews.author: RM
